Disposal of Recyclables. All recyclable materials as stated in § 2.201 (9)
Hazardous Waste. Materials designated as hazardous waste or hazardous subst
It shall be illegal to dispose of solid waste on tribal or allotment lands
Solid waste and recyclable materials may be disposed of by private collecto
Vehicle batteries shall not be disposed of on any lands within the Lac Cour
Used engine oil shall not be disposed at the LCO Transfer Station and Recyc

It shall be illegal to burn solid waste materials in residential burning ba

It shall be illegal to hunt wild animals in the immediate vicinity of the L
All solid waste, not collected by private collectors and transferred away,
It is unlawful for any person to fail to dispose of solid waste, which may
General Provisions. Solid Waste generated outside the reservation boundarie
